name: 1.) Using the USPD web app, choose a state & county (or counties) to search. Pick a locale that doesn't show up. Stick with District & State Attorneys.
2.) Download this template & upload it to your own Google Drive. Make sure it is private.
3.) Fill in as much information as you can find.
4.) When finished, leave a comment on this GitHub issue (or send a maintainer an email; their contact information is on the README.md): https://github.com/billimarie/prosecutor-database/issues/80
5.) Your data will be added to the database, & your GitHub profile will be added to the Contributors gallery (if you'd like).
